summary: The realm of Oblivion in physical form. A completely standalone and powerful follower who is basically evil made flesh.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/43187-0-1445444743.jpg[/img]

[color=yellow][size=+3]Updated with CUSTOM BREAST TEXTURES!!![/color][/size]

CBBEv3 link- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666//?]CBBE body mod[/url]

ApachiiSkyHair link- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168//?]Apachi Skyhair mod[/url]

[heading]EXTRA SPECIAL THANKS:[/heading]
[color=red]To Apachii for taking the time to teach me how to make his hair truly standalone.[/color]

If you like my mod you know what to do. :)

[color=yellow]AND YOU ARE WELCOME TO UPLOAD YOUR PICTURES EVERYONE.[/color]

[color=red]CREDITS:[/color]
Me
Caliente
Apachii
Bethesda

Armor used in screenshots is one from the Tera armor collection CBBE nausicaa, and the other is LustDesign Female Daedric Armor Replacer lustrianna.

Oh, and check out my other mods
Midnight Standalone Follower-
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26369/?][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/26369-1-1389599619.jpg[/img][/url]

and Victoria- FIRST standalone follower EVER TO HAVE GLOWING EYES.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/44969/?][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/44969-1-1389598781.jpg[/img][/url]

and Ra.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50721/?][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/50721-1-1391470816.jpg[/img][/url]

And check out my Spell Mod: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50868/?]Atom Bomb - Ultra Powerful Spell[/url]


[color=yellow][size=+2]Thanks to everyone who supports my mods.[/size][/color] :)
author: automatik25
